name: Spotify DJ
description: Control Spotify playback, create playlists, and discover music through AI-powered recommendations
ai_summary: A well-built Spotify integration with comprehensive playback control and AI-powered playlist generation.
one_liner: AI-powered Spotify control and playlist generation
usage_guide:
```
Play my favorite songs
Create a workout playlist
```
safety_notes: Requires Spotify API token. No data stored externally.

name: Code Analyzer
description: Static code analysis and linting for multiple programming languages
ai_summary: Production-grade static analysis tool supporting Python, TypeScript, and Go with comprehensive rule sets.
usage_guide:
```
Analyze my Python code for issues
Lint the entire project
```
safety_notes: Read-only access to source files. No network calls.

name: Trade Signal
description: Real-time cryptocurrency trading signal analysis with technical indicators
ai_summary: Crypto trading signal generator using RSI, MACD, and Bollinger Bands. Beta quality.
one_liner: Crypto trading signals with technical analysis
usage_guide:
```
Analyze BTC/USDT signals
Show me SOL trading opportunities
```
safety_notes: Connects to exchange APIs. API keys stored locally. Use at your own risk.
